problem: Contact Details tabs were using manual implementation instead of centralized tabs system, causing inconsistent styling and missing enterprise-class architecture
cause: Original ContactDetails component used hardcoded Tabs components without centralized theming and styling system

solution.phase1: Created TabsOnlyTriggers component for clean tab centralization without content interference
solution.phase2: Added comprehensive theme system with container/trigger/content separation
solution.phase3: Applied centralized tabs to ContactDetails (Info, Documents, History tabs)
solution.phase4: Unified theme styling - both ContactsToolbar and ContactDetails use warning theme
solution.phase5: Preserved original content layout completely while centralizing tab structure

testing: Manual testing verified tabs functionality, theming consistency, and content preservation in localhost:3000/contacts
notes: CRITICAL SUCCESS: Solved content wrapper interference problem that caused previous failures
TabsOnlyTriggers component renders children directly without wrapper styling
All contact tabs now use unified 'warning' theme (orange/amber colors)
Enterprise architecture: Separation of concerns between tab structure and content styling
Backward compatible with existing TabsContainer for other use cases
